name: Fo Shoal
description:
You are a small shoal of fish trying to survive in a lake filled with predetors. Avoid the dangers and find delicious flies to survive for as long as possible.

Created during Game maker toolkits annual game jam june 11th to 13th 2021 by Simon Ochsenius and Bo Ashi.

Made with game maker, chips, coffee, understanding girlfriends and alcohol.

-------------

Controls:

Mouse scroll wheel = Change size of shoal

Mouse pointer = Navigate shoal

-------------

Ambience sounds from Zaplsplat.com
